# Hello

Statistical reports for the [Lichess4545](https://www.lichess4545.com/) [Team](https://www.lichess4545.com/team4545/) (45+45) and [LoneWolf](https://www.lichess4545.com/lonewolf/) (30+30) online chess leagues.


```{r}

completed_seasons <- c("4545_s20")

completed <- tibble("season" = completed_seasons)

completed <- completed %>% 
  mutate(report_url = paste0("https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/reports/stats_", completed_seasons, ".html"))

knitr::kable(completed)
```
